name: Exquisite Wrath Of The Bullets
description:
Exquisite Wrath Of The Bullets (EWOTB) is a pistol duel game with awesome 4-colors pixel art graphics !!

Press your key (or touch your target) before your opponent to win.

How fast can you react?

Train yourself with the solo mode then face your friends, be the fastest and taunt them :)

Feel free to review and check my other games!
